price: Na bila ya shaka tumekwisha waangamiza wenzenu. Lakini yupo anaye kumbuka?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
footnotes: Na bila ya shaka Sisi tumekwisha waangamiza wengine walio fanana nanyi katika ukafiri. Je! Yupo aliye waidihika?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā ashyāʿakum fahal min muddakirin
